name: California Junkyard Parking game
description:
California Junkyard Parking

Free 3D JunkYard Garbage Truck Parking simulation game for the real skilled drivers out there. Start driving this amazingly realistic 3D
garbage truck without the need of a drivers license.
In this realistic 3D garbage pickup you have to pick up many different kinds of garbage by 3D truck and bring them to the junkyard hill.
better hurry before it starts to stink!
Your task is to cleaned up all locations with garbage truck.
Done with a lot driver parking, transporter, games that offers you just to park your garbage vehicle.

This game is unique with challenging driver mission.

Key Features:

- The driving physics are amazingly realistic
- easy to control, this makes it fun to play for all ages
- many different levels of parking and real driving, so you will learn everything about driving one of these big 3D trucks
- an amazing 3D game and 3D city to drive in with your garbage truck
